alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 12:26PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .The Green River will slowly fall early this week, with the stage at Paradise going below flood stage tomorrow. Several rounds of rain this week will cause it to go back above flood stage on Wednesday. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 380.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CST Monday was 382.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 384.9 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
